SELECT dm.message_idx, dm.content, dm.reg_date, dm.receive_email, dm.receive_del, dm.sender_email, dm.sender_del, dm.read_check, dm.idx, r.idx, r.report_complete FROM deal_message dm LEFT JOIN (SELECT r.report_idx, r.option_idx, r.idx, r.report_complete, r.reg_date FROM report r WHERE r.option_idx = 'RB003' AND r.report_complete = 'N') AS r ON dm.message_idx = r.idx WHERE r.idx IS NOT NULL AND CASE WHEN #{param1} = 0 THEN 1=1 ELSE dm.message_idx = #{param1} END ORDER BY r.reg_date

SELECT dm.idx, dm.sender_email, dm.receive_email, b.subject, dm.reg_date FROM deal_message dm LEFT JOIN (SELECT b.idx, b.email, b.subject FROM bbs b) AS b ON dm.idx = b.idx WHERE dm.receive_email = b.email AND CASE WHEN #{param1} = 0 THEN 1=1 ELSE dm.idx = #{param1} END GROUP BY dm.idx, dm.receive_email, dm.sender_email ORDER BY dm.idx

SELECT dm.idx, dm.sender_email, dm.receive_email, b.subject, dm.reg_date, r.report_idx, r.perpet_email, r.reporter_email FROM deal_message dm LEFT JOIN (SELECT b.idx, b.email, b.subject FROM bbs b) AS b ON dm.idx = b.idx LEFT JOIN (SELECT r.report_idx, r.option_idx, r.idx, r.report_complete, r.reg_date, r.perpet_email, r.reporter_email FROM report r WHERE r.option_idx = 'RB002' AND r.report_complete = 'N') AS r ON dm.idx = r.idx AND (dm.sender_email = r.reporter_email OR dm.sender_email = r.perpet_email) AND (dm.receive_email = r.reporter_email OR dm.receive_email = r.perpet_email) WHERE dm.receive_email = b.email AND r.idx IS NOT NULL AND CASE WHEN #{param1} = 0 THEN 1=1 ELSE dm.idx = #{param1} END GROUP BY dm.idx, dm.receive_email, dm.sender_email ORDER BY dm.idx
